meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a horse.
meanings.sent1: The horsier toy had a mane and tail like a horse.
meanings.sent2: The horsier features of the sculpture made it look like a horse.
meanings.sent3: The horsier painting of a horse wearing sunglasses was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her horsier laughter echoed through the barn like a horse's whinny.
meanings.sent5: The horsier smell of hay in the stable brought back memories of riding horses.

meanings.definition: Having a strong interest in or knowledge of horses.
meanings.sent1: She was the horsier of the two sisters, always talking about horses.
meanings.sent2: The horsier kids at school loved to spend time at the horse ranch.
meanings.sent3: The horsier girl in the class had a collection of toy horses on her desk.
meanings.sent4: His horsier enthusiasm for horses was evident in the way he talked about them.
meanings.sent5: The horsier boy dreamt of becoming a horse trainer when he grew up.
